blocks.name: ctrpred
blocks.content: Define the transitive predecessor class as a class.
blocks.origin: prop class ctrpred(class c0, class c1, class c2) { TrPred(c0, c1, c2) }

blocks.name: diff.ctrpred.s
diff.ctrpred.c
diff.ctrpred.w
df-trpred
blocks.content: Define the transitive predecessors of a class ` X ` under a relationship ` R ` and a class ` A ` . This class can be thought of as the "smallest" class containing all elements of ` A ` that are linked to ` X ` by a chain of ` R ` relationships (see ~ trpredtr and ~ trpredmintr ). Definition based off of Lemma 4.2 of Don Monk's notes for Advanced Set Theory, which can be found at ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/settheory (check The Internet Archive for it now as Prof. Monk appears to have rewritten his website). (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-trpred(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, ciun(s1, cv(s0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-trpred(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= ⋃ ran((rec((s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s1 ∈ s0, Pred(c0, c1, s1))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
}

blocks.name: dftrpred2
blocks.content: A definition of the transitive predecessors of a class in terms of indexed union. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Apr-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm dftrpred2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(s0))), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))))
  df-trpred(s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(s0))), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com)))), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), com))
  frfnom(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2))
  fniunfv(s0, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), com)
  diff.cres.s(s0, crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s0, cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2))))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s2, cv(s1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dftrpred2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ TrPred(c0, c1, c2)= ⋃(s0 ∈ _om,((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtr4i(TrPred(c0, c1, c2), ⋃(s0 ∈ _om,((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)` s0)), ⋃ ran((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)))
  df-trpred(s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  ax-mp(⋃(s0 ∈ _om,((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)` s0))= ⋃ ran((rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)), (rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om)[Fn]_om)
  frfnom((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  fniunfv(s0, (rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))|` _om), com)
  diff.cres.s(s0, rec((s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2)), com)
  diff.crdg.s(s0, (s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))), Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, universe, ⋃(s2 ∈ s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s2, s1, Pred(c0, c1, s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: trpredeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for transitive predecessors. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm trpredeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctrpred(c0, c2, c3), ctrpred(c1, c2, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ctrpred(c0, c2, c3), ctrpred(c1, c2, c3), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3)), com))), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com))), wceq(c0, c1))
  unieqd(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3)), com)), crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com)), wceq(c0, c1))
  rneqd(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3)), com), cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), wceq(c0, c1))
  reseq1d(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3)), com, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3)), crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3))), wceq(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, c3), cpred(c1, c2, c3)))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1))), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  iuneq2d(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  predeq1(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs1))
  predeq1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rdgeq12(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs1)))), cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c1, c2, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c2, c3), cpred(c1, c2, c3))
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c3)
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trpredeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → TrPred(c0, c2, c3)= TrPred(c1, c2, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(TrPred(c0, c2, c3), TrPred(c1, c2, c3), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3))|` _om)), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c1, c2, c3))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  unieqd(ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3))|` _om)), ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c1, c2, c3))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  rneqd((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3))|` _om), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c1, c2, c3))|` _om), c0 = c1)
  reseq1d(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3)), com, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c1, c2, c3)), c0 = c1)
  syl2anc(c0 = c1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3))= rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c1, c2, c3)), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1)))=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3)= Pred(c1, c2, c3))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1)), ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1)), c0 = c1)
  iuneq2d(hs1, hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1), Pred(c1, c2, hs1), c0 = c1)
  predeq1(c0, c1, c2, hs1)
  predeq1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rdgeq12((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c0, c2, hs1))), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c1, c2, hs1))), Pred(c0, c2, c3), Pred(c1, c2, c3))
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c3)
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  3eqtr4g(ctrpred(c2, c0, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c3), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c0, c3)), com))), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c1, c3)), com))), wceq(c0, c1))

thm trpredeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → TrPred(c2, c0, c3)= TrPred(c2, c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(TrPred(c2, c0, c3), TrPred(c2, c1, c3), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3))|` _om)), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c1, c3))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  unieqd(ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3))|` _om)), ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c1, c3))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  rneqd((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3))|` _om), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c1, c3))|` _om), c0 = c1)
  syl2anc(c0 = c1, (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3))|` _om)=(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c1, c3))|` _om), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1)))=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1)), ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1)), c0 = c1)
  iuneq2d(hs1, hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1), Pred(c2, c1, hs1), c0 = c1)
  predeq2(c0, c1, c2, hs1)
  predeq2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  reseq1d(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3)), com, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c1, c3)), ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1)))=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1)))∧ Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3)))
  rdgeq12((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c0, hs1))), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c1, hs1))), Pred(c2, c0, c3), Pred(c2, c1, c3))
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3)
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3)

thm trpredeq3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctrpred(c2, c3, c0), ctrpred(c2, c3, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ctrpred(c2, c3, c0), ctrpred(c2, c3, c1), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c0)), com))), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c1)), com))), wceq(c0, c1))
  unieqd(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c0)), com)), crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c1)), com)), wceq(c0, c1))
  rneqd(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c0)), com), cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c1)), com), wceq(c0, c1))
  reseq1d(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c0)), com, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c0)), crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c2, c3, c1))), wceq(cpred(c2, c3, c0), cpred(c2, c3, c1)))
  predeq3(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rdgeq2(cpred(c2, c3, c0), cpred(c2, c3, c1), cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs1)))))
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0)
  df-trpred(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → TrPred(c2, c3, c0)= TrPred(c2, c3, c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(TrPred(c2, c3, c0), TrPred(c2, c3, c1), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c0))|` _om)), ⋃ ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c1))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  unieqd(ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c0))|` _om)), ran((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c1))|` _om)), c0 = c1)
  rneqd((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c0))|` _om), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c1))|` _om), c0 = c1)
  reseq1d(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c0)), com, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c1)), c0 = c1)
  syl(c0 = c1, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c0))= rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))), Pred(c2, c3, c1)), Pred(c2, c3, c0)= Pred(c2, c3, c1))
  predeq3(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rdgeq2(Pred(c2, c3, c0), Pred(c2, c3, c1), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋃(hs1 ∈ hs0, Pred(c2, c3, hs1))))

blocks.name: eltrpred
blocks.content: A class is a transitive predecessor iff it is in some value of the underlying function. This theorem is not really meant to be used directly: instead refer to ~ trpredpred and ~ trpredmintr . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Apr-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm eltrpred(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctrpred(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ctrpred(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ctrpred(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  bitri(wcel(c0, ctrpred(c1, c2, c3)), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0)))))
  eleq2i(c0, ctrpred(c1, c2, c3), ciun(s0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0))))
  dftrpred2(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3)
  eliun(s0, c0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, ciun(s2, cv(s1), cpred(c1, c2, cv(s2)))), cpred(c1, c2, c3)), com), cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: trpredpred
blocks.content: Assuming it exists, the predecessor class is a subset of the transitive predecessors. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2011.)

  |- wi(wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  syl6sseqr(cpred(c0, c1, c2), ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))), wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  syl(wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com)))), wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))))
  mpbird(wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs2), cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
  syl(wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs2), cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cpred(c0, c1, c2))), wbr(emptycls, cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cpred(c0, c1, c2)))

  fr0g(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), emptycls), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(emptycls, cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cpred(c0, c1, c2))), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), com), wcel(emptycls, com))

thm trpredss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  dftrpred2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2)
  sylibr(wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wss(ciun(hs0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs1, universe, ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(hs0))), c1), wral(hs0, com, wss(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs1, universe, ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, com, wcel(cpred(c0, c1, c2), c3), wss(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs1, universe, ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(hs0)), c1))
  trpredlem1(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  iunss(hs0, com, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs1, universe, ciun(hs2, cv(hs1), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs2)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), cv(hs0)), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: trpredmintr
blocks.content: The transitive predecessors form the smallest class transitive in ` R ` and ` A ` . That is, if ` B ` is another ` R ` , ` A ` transitive class containing ` Pred ( R , A , X ) ` , then ` TrPred ( R , A , X ) C_ B ` (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Apr-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: trpredelss
blocks.content: Given a transitive predecessor ` Y ` of ` X ` , the transitive predecessors of ` Y ` are a subset of the transitive predecessors of ` X ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Apr-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm trpredelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)), wss(ctrpred(c2, c1, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)), wss(ctrpred(c2, c1, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  syl22anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))), wss(ctrpred(c2, c1, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c3, c1), wse(c2, c1), wral(hs0, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))), wss(cpred(c2, c1, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  sselda(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wss(ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), c1), wcel(cpred(c2, c1, c0), universe))
  setlikespec(c0, c1, c2)
  trpredss(c2, c1, c0, universe)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1), wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)), wral(hs0, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  trpredtr(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)), wss(cpred(c2, c1, c3), ctrpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  trpredtr(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  trpredmintr(hs0, c3, c1, c2, ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ctrpred(c2, c1, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trpredelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1)→(c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0)→ TrPred(c2, c1, c3)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0)))
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1), c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), TrPred(c2, c1, c3)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  syl22anc(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1)∧ c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0)), TrPred(c2, c1, c3)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), c3 ∈ c1, c2[Se]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), Pred(c2, c1, hs0)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0)), Pred(c2, c1, c3)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  sselda(c3, TrPred(c2, c1, c0), c1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1))
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1), TrPred(c2, c1, c0)⊆ c1, Pred(c2, c1, c0)∈ 𝕌)
  setlikespec(c0, c1, c2)
  trpredss(c2, c1, c0, universe)
  simplr(c0 ∈ c1, c2[Se]c1, c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  adantr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1), c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), Pred(c2, c1, hs0)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, TrPred(c2, c1, c0), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1), Pred(c2, c1, hs0)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  trpredtr(c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  imp((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1), c3 ∈ TrPred(c2, c1, c0), Pred(c2, c1, c3)⊆ TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  trpredtr(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  trpredmintr(hs0, c3, c1, c2, TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[Se]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(TrPred(c2, c1, c0))
}

blocks.name: dftrpred4g
blocks.content: Another recursive expression for the transitive predecessors. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Apr-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

thm dftrpred4g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)), wceq(ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), ciun(s0, cpred(c2, c1, c0), cun(csn(cv(s0)), ctrpred(c2, c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6eqr(ctrpred(c2, c1, c0), ciun(s0, cpred(c2, c1, c0), cun(csn(cv(s0)), ctrpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)))), cun(cpred(c2, c1, c0), ciun(s0, cpred(c2, c1, c0), ctrpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1)))

blocks.name: trpredex
blocks.content: The transitive predecessors of a relation form a set (NOTE: this is the first theorem in the transitive predecessor series that requires infinity). (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm trpredex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), universe)
} = {
  eqeltri(ctrpred(c0, c1, c2), universe, cuni(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))))

  uniex(crn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com)))
  rnex(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com))
  mp2an(wcel(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), universe), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), com), wcel(com, universe))
  frfnom(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2))
  omex()
  fnex(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs1)))), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), com), com, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: trpredrec
blocks.content: If ` Y ` is an ` R ` , ` A ` transitive predecessor, then it is either an immediate predecessor or there is a transitive predecessor between ` Y ` and ` X ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-May-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
